result.arabic_text: زَعَمَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ أَن لَّن يُبۡعَثُواْۚ قُلۡ بَلَىٰ وَرَبِّي لَتُبۡعَثُنَّ ثُمَّ لَتُنَبَّؤُنَّ بِمَا عَمِلۡتُمۡۚ وَذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرٞ
result.translation: Abahakanyi bakeka ko batazazurwa (ngo babazwe)? Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti “Yego! Ndahiye ku izina rya Nyagasani wanjye, rwose muzazurwa maze mubwirwe ibyo mwakoze, kandi kuri Allah ibyo biroroshye.”
